title: Uber to launch AI assistant powered by OpenAI's GPT-4o to help drivers go electric
description: The AI assistant, based on OpenAI's GPT-4o, was unveiled at Uber's Go-Get Zero event in London on Tuesday. The chatbot is set to launch early next year in the United States and will later expand to other locations.
content: Uber Technologies will roll out an AI assistant powered by OpenAI's technology to help drivers transition to electric vehicles, as part of its efforts to lower emissions.
cleaned_content: uber technologies will roll out an ai assistant powered by openais technology to help drivers transition to electric vehicles as part of its efforts to lower emissions
